channel.title: Installed program in TemplateVM not installed in AppVM
channel.description:
Hi all,
I installed OnionShare in TemplateVM via Flatpak but when I try to launch it in AppVM it says " app/org.onionshare.OnionShare/x86_64/master **not installed**", even though I added OnionShare to the available applications in Qube Settings and the file /usr/bin/onionshare is present.
Thanks.

item.title: Installed program in TemplateVM not installed in AppVM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Answered here:
/var/run/tor/control broken symlink - #14 by Patrick

Read full topic
item.source: Installed program in TemplateVM not installed in AppVM
